high_descs:
turn around go straight and turn left to reach the bed room 
pick up the salt shaker from the wooden rack 
turn right and walk to the lamp in the corner.
 Turn on the lamp.
Head rotate and walk towards the side table.
Turn left and pick the pepper shaker from the bed.
Turn right to the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pepper shaker by the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: Walk straight ahead and proceed to the table, after reaching the table, pause briefly for a second, make a left turn and head towards the door located near the lamp.
Upon reaching the lamp table, look beside the tissue paper roll and pick up the salt sprayer.

Turn left and locate the cup on the bed and pour the salt from the sprayer into the cup.
After pouring the salt, turn back to face the lamp table.
Finally, find and turn on the lamp to illuminate the area.
anns.task_desc: The goal of these instructions is to have the robot turn on the lamp and to ensure that the salt from the sprayer is poured into the cup on the bed.
